about_the_game:
Core Breach is a twin-stick shooter inspired by games like Snake and Geometry Wars, presented in a pixel art style with roguelike elements. You play as a Trojan worm virus infiltrating a CPU core to retrieve the secrets hidden within.

Procedurally generated waves of antivirus enemies, controlled by a superior AI, will try to stop you from breaching the core. Quick thinking and lightning-fast reflexes are essential as you navigate your way to the end. Choosing and upgrading the right arsenal of weapons is critical to destroying everything in your path.

However, this isn’t your typical guns-blazing shoot ‘em up. You'll need to be mindful of your trigger finger, as your ammunition is directly tied to the health of your Trojan worm. Picking the right upgrades for your worm will be vital to your survival.

Main Features of the Full Game:

  • Major language support (Demo is currently in English)

  • A greater variety of waves, increasing in difficulty as you progress

  • Unlockable primary attacks to suit different playstyles

  • Additional special abilities and attacks

  • Challenging game modes

  • Multiple difficulty levels to test your skills

  • Online leaderboards

  • Daily runs to compete against players worldwide
